name: Fallout 2 Remake
storyline: Originally a turn-based tactical Western RPG, now experience Fallout 2 in first person! You, the Chosen One, are tasked with exploring post-nuclear California to locate and retrieve the fabled Garden of Eden Creation Kit for their famine-stricken tribe while coming into contact through branching dialogue trees with numerous tribes, factions, and micro-civilizations, each with their own virtues, vices, socioeconomic situations, and political agendas.
summary: An enthusiast with the nickname ConstructVOD released an early version of his own remake of the iconic Fallout 2 on a different engine. Anyone can download it for free. In addition, you can evaluate the project directly in the browser.
